functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Drowning Key\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"In cities of old the condemned were","color":"gray"}','{"text":"hung on poles as warnings to all.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Tyre preferred to ignore such","color":"gray"}','{"text":"realities, and so erected a cage to","color":"gray"}','{"text":"drown them out of sight, and","color":"gray"}','{"text":"facilitate the removal and burial of","color":"gray"}','{"text":"their corpses.","color":"gray"}']}}
